glitch_text.title: Glitch Text
glitch_text.description: Military HUD-style text distortion effect. Cyan + Red chromatic aberration overlay with stutter animation.

data_stream.title: Data Stream
data_stream.description: Real-time terminal feed with auto-scroll. Color-coded messages by category [SYS], [NET], [SEC], [DAT]. Signature cursor blink.

scan_divider.title: Scan Divider
scan_divider.description: Content separator with glowing gradient line and diamond label. An elegant alternative to a plain <hr>.
scan_divider.prop_label: Optional label in the center of the divider

topo_pattern.title: Topographic Pattern
topo_pattern.description: Contour-line topographic pattern inspired by Endfield terrain maps. Generative SVG with hover glow effect — ideal for decorative backgrounds or section dividers.

hud_overlay.title: HUD Overlay
hud_overlay.description: Heads-Up Display overlay with corner brackets, crosshair, status bar, and real-time coordinates.
hud_overlay.prop_children: Main content inside the HUD frame

tactical_panel.title: Tactical Panel
tactical_panel.description: HUD panel with scanline overlay, 4-corner accent brackets, and status indicator. Suitable for dashboards or monitoring UIs.
tactical_panel.prop_title: Panel title in the header bar
tactical_panel.prop_status: Status indicator with color and label

holo_card.title: Holo Card
holo_card.description: Card with holographic scan line effect — a light beam moves vertically on hover. Clip-corner + shimmer gradient.

tactical_badge.title: Tactical Badge
tactical_badge.description: Badge with clip-corner-sm and diamond marker ◆. Angular Endfield-identity replacement for the standard rounded-pill badge.

coordinate_tag.title: Coordinate Tag
coordinate_tag.description: Compact terminal-style key-value data label. Ideal for metadata, specifications, or brief status info.

radar_chart.title: Radar Chart
radar_chart.description: HUD-style radar chart with polygonal grid, glowing data points, and reveal animation. Pure SVG with no external libraries.

diamond_loader.title: Diamond Loader
diamond_loader.description: Stacked diamond-shaped loading spinner with counter-rotation. Signature Endfield replacement for the standard spinner.

warning_banner.title: Warning Banner
warning_banner.description: Military-style warning banner with three levels: caution (yellow), alert (orange), critical (red). Clip-corner with AlertTriangle icon.

demo.warning_caution_msg: Routine maintenance scheduled at 0300. Expect intermittent connectivity.
demo.warning_alert_msg: Anomaly detected in sector 7-G. Dispatching reconnaissance unit.
demo.warning_critical_msg: Perimeter breach detected. All units standby for immediate response.
